mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE, DESCRIPTION, IMAGE_URL, PRICE, OPEN_TIME, CREATED_AT FROM TOURIST_SPOTS ORDER BY ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOURIST_SPOTS ( NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE, DESCRIPTION, IMAGE_URL, PRICE, OPEN_TIME, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{description}, #{imageUrl}, #{price}, #{openTime}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TOURIST_SPOTS SET NAME = #{name}, ADDRESS = #{address}, PHONE = #{phone}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, IMAGE_URL = #{imageUrl}, PRICE = #{price}, OPEN_TIME = #{openTime} WHERE ID = #{id}
